class.name: Characteristic
class.doc: This template implements the functions specific for the Scan Result Characteristic. It takes care of setting and reading the list of scanned devices and handles notify requests for the characteristic, in particular making sure that the list is sent over the air.

method.name: getCharacteristicValue
method.brief: Returns the ScanResult object currently assigned to the characteristic
method.doc: Serialized the ScanResult object into a byte buffer and returns it as a <CharacteristicValue>

return.doc: the serialized ScanResult object in a <CharacteristicValue> object

method.name: getValueMaxLength
method.brief: Return the maximum possible length of the buffer

method.name: onNotifyTxError
method.brief: Callback function if a notify tx error occurs
method.doc:
This is called when the notify operation fails with a tx error. This can occur when too many tx operations are taking place at the same time.
A BLEpp::CharacteristicBase::notify is called when the master device connected to the Crownstone requests automatic notifications whenever the value changes.

method.name: onTxComplete
method.brief: Callback function once tx operations complete

method.name: setCharacteristicValue
method.brief: Assign the given <CharacteristicValue> to this characteristic
